# stop(reason:)

**Instance Method**

Prepares the filter to stop, in response to a call from the framework.

## Declaration

```swift
func stop(reason: NEProviderStopReason) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **reason**: An [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProviderStopReason] that indicates why the framework is stopping the filter.

## Discussion

Override this method in your conformance to [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEURLFilterControlProvider] and perform whatever steps are necessary to prepare for the URL filter stopping.

## Starting and stopping the provider

- **start()**: Prepares the filter to start, in response to a call from the framework.
